channel.title: 614 Server Help
channel.description:
Okay, so several weeks ago, I downloaded and started coding on a 562 server base (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,435936.0.html). I think it's rs2hd. However, I really enjoy the 614 graphics a lot more than the 562 ones, so here's my question: is it possible to convert a 562 server into a 614 server, and if so, where would I start?
I'm not expecting a full step-by-step tutorial on how to do this. I just want some advice on where I could start. Also, I'm trying my hardest not to have to download an already coded 614 server because the server I've been working on has A LOT of custom coding and its structure is very easy to work with.
I know I'll have to change packet IDs, packet information, etc., etc, but if there is any advice anyone could give me, it'd be awesome :).
Here's the 614 client I think I'll be using if I can successfully do this: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,453927.0.html

item.title: 614 Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

Okay, so several weeks ago, I downloaded and started coding on a 562 server base (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,435936.0.html). I think it’s rs2hd. However, I really enjoy the 614 graphics a lot more than the 562 ones, so here’s my question: is it possible to convert a 562 server into a 614 server, and if so, where would I start?

I’m not expecting a full step-by-step tutorial on how to do this. I just want some advice on where I could start. Also, I’m trying my hardest not to have to download an already coded 614 server because the server I’ve been working on has A LOT of custom coding and its structure is very easy to work with.

I know I’ll have to change packet IDs, packet information, etc., etc, but if there is any advice anyone could give me, it’d be awesome :).

Here’s the 614 client I think I’ll be using if I can successfully do this: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,453927.0.html
